data.title: China Imposes Tariffs On U.S. Imports Starting February 2025
data.description: According to PANews, China's State Council Tariff Commission has announced new tariffs on certain imports from the United States, effective February 10, 2025. With approval from the State Council, the tariffs will include a 15% duty on coal and liquefied natural gas. Additionally, a 10% tariff will be applied to crude oil, agricultural machinery, large-engine vehicles, and pickup trucks.

data.title: The historical cumulative net inflow of Bitcoin spot ETF has reached 40.263 billion US dollars, and the net outflow was the first after the net inflow in the past 4 days
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to SoSoValue data, yesterday (February 3, Eastern Time), the total net outflow of Bitcoin spot ETFs was US$235 million.
Yesterday, Grayscale ETF GBTC had a single-day net inflow of US$8.0191 million, and the current historical net outflow of GBTC is US$21.883 billion.
Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust ETF BTC had a single-day net outflow of US$0.00, and the current historical total net inflow of Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust BTC is US$1.232 billion.
As of press time, the total net asset value of Bitcoin spot ETF is US$119.14 billion, the ETF net asset ratio (market value to the total market value of Bitcoin) is 5.95%, and the historical cumulative net inflow has reached US$40.263 billion.

data.title: The Ethereum spot ETF has accumulated a total net inflow of US$2.842 billion, and the ETF net asset ratio has reached 3.06%.
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to SoSoValue data, yesterday (February 3, Eastern Time), the total net inflow of Ethereum spot ETFs was 83.5404 million US dollars.
Yesterday, Grayscale Ethereum Trust ETF ETHE had a single-day net inflow of 15.8517 million US dollars, and the current historical net outflow of ETHE is 3.918 billion US dollars.
Grayscale Ethereum Mini Trust ETF ETH had a single-day net inflow of 12.7543 million US dollars, and the current historical total net inflow of Grayscale Ethereum Mini Trust ETH is 607 million US dollars.
The Ethereum spot ETF with the largest single-day net inflow yesterday was Fidelity ETF FETH, with a single-day net inflow of 49.7493 million US dollars, and the current historical total net inflow of FETH reached 1.462 billion US dollars.
The second is Grayscale ETF ETHE, with a single-day net inflow of US$15.8517 million. Currently, ETHE has a total net outflow of US$3.918 billion.
As of press time, the total net asset value of Ethereum spot ETF is US$9.979 billion, and the ETF net asset ratio (market value to Ethereum's total market value) is 3.06%, and the historical cumulative net inflow has reached US$2.842 billion.
